message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth $12000. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10000. This is an exceptional deal considering the benefits and quality it offers. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
